quirks: is upset about traffic regulation, we should just let it sort itself out
is looking for any excuse to talk about mice
doesn't know they have lettuce in their teeth
pronounces ‟th” as ‟f”, but avoids making that sound at all costs. (they're bad at it)
fully believes that everyone lives in a simulation, but if they do a good job, they'll be released
believes crimes don't count if you announce them first
is afraid of bees
thinks they are much larger than they are, moves to accommodate this
does not know how to count
needs a light for their cigarette
won't make eye contact unless they're actively talking
isn't sure if they're in the right place
is allergic to all fruit, but they only get itchy (and assume everyone else does this)
thinks they can always tell when light is artificial or natural
hates wishy-washyness
thinks arithmetic is magic
doesn't know what dreams are
thinks that all smells come from flowers
forgets anything unless its written down, does not keep a journal
behaves like three toddlers in a trench coat. (is not)
